title: Project Kickoff Meeting
description: Join us for the official launch of the Edu-GArD3n project. Meet the consortium partners, learn about project objectives, and participate in planning workshops.
content_markdown:
## Welcome to Edu-GArD3n Kickoff

We are excited to launch the **Edu-GArD3n** project, bringing together partners from across Europe to revolutionize green additive manufacturing education.

## Event Highlights

- Meet all consortium partners
- Project objectives presentation
- Interactive planning workshops
- Networking opportunities
- Collaborative strategy sessions

## What to Expect

This full-day event will provide an overview of the project scope, deliverables, and timeline. Participants will engage in hands-on planning sessions to establish the foundation for successful collaboration.

### Schedule Overview

1. **09:00 - 10:00** - Registration and welcome coffee
2. **10:00 - 12:00** - Project presentation and goals
3. **12:00 - 13:00** - Lunch break
4. **13:00 - 15:30** - Planning workshops
5. **15:30 - 17:00** - Open discussion and next steps

*Don't miss this opportunity to shape the future of sustainable manufacturing education!*
